'''Sacred Ibis''' is a type of bird. It can be found both as [[Wildlife]] and as a pet in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

Outdoor animals can only be placed in outdoor spaces within the Serenitea Pot.

==Drops==
{{Card|Fowl|2}}

Killing one for the first time will add this creature's entry into the player's in-game [[archive]].

==Locations==
Can be found south-west of [[Dar al-Shifa]] and north-east of [[The Dune of Carouses]].
